title: Optimizing Language Education through Knowledge System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience, proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Customized language skill development for professionals to improve work efficiency.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically organize language education content by applying principles of knowledge delivery system design
Learners can design assessment systems to measure language learning effectiveness using digital tools
Learners can develop interaction-based knowledge delivery processes tailored to small group characteristics
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
